attributes.action: Replace all referees in VAR with retired professional football players.
attributes.additional_details: Pass a law that says VAR must be run by former players so that there can be no conflict of interest and no covering of mistakes for the on-field referee.
attributes.background: Football is the national sport and referees are spoiling it with their bad implementation of VAR. They are using VAR to cover errors by the on-field referee. The VAR officials should all be former players who love football, ideally players who have been the victim of poor referring decisions.

rejection.details: The choice of VAR officials is run by the Premier League and the Professional Game Match Officials Limited (PGMOL) group. See https://www.premierleague.com/VAR/FAQs
